author: andyc
msg: The document scanner is working again. There's still work to do
but now it can scan a basic XML document. It's not fully tested
but here is what it supports:
Currently it does not support CDATA sections and attribute
scanning should be improved. In fact, there are several parts
that can be improved but this is a good skeleton to start
